isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 5000 9100 9200 9400 9900 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - 5000, 5000i, 9000, 9000i - DESCRIPTION - INDICATOR AND WARNING LIGHTS

svcproc.title: INDICATOR AND WARNING LIGHTS
svcproc.para: The various warning and indicator lights in the instrument panel are controlled by a variety of components. The general categories are:

step1.para: Speedometer/Tachometer Module controls the Low Oil Pressure, High Water Temperature and the Low Fuel warning lights.
ECM(electronic engines) controls the engine lights (Warn Engine, Stop Engine, Serv/Check Engine lights).
ABS/Traction Control Module controls the Traction Control and ABS lights.

svcproc.para: Others such as Front Axle, Park Brake, Air Suspension Dump, etc. are controlled by individual switches in the respective circuits.
